Home » Event

Annual Fish Fry and Martini Fest

DATE: SATURDAY, JUNE 15TH

MAKE YOUR RESERVATIONS TODAY. The Fish Fry started in the early days of the club when our power boat members went fishing and brought in their catch. With a great recipe for the fish, and an opportunity to get together, they started a tradition that is still enjoyed to this day! We have changed locations and buy the fish, but it is local and fresh and prepared in the same way........ so join us!

Our very own "Master Chef's" will be back in the Kitchen, to prepare one of the Best Pan Fried Haddock Dinners served in the Bay! So celebrate Father's Day early and take Dad or Gramps out for dinner at the marina.

▲TOP
